metadata.title: Generic Greedy MSF Growth Algorithm (GGMSFGA)
metadata.description: The Generic Greedy MSF Growth Algorithm (GGMSFGA) is a generic algorithm for finding the MSF of an undirected graph. GGMSFA maintains a forest F which is a subgraph of some MSF. In each iteration, it chooses a cut C which respects F and adds a light edge of C to F.
